title: Reading: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 5
description: Anthropology is going to have to be approached differently, in fact, foundationally. The Metaphysical structure needs to be reoriented. Both the positivists and the mystics object to metaphysics - which bodes well for Quality as base reality.  The beginning of the Metaphysics of Quality.
